original: simpl. intros H1 H2. induction p as [n | v | i | op p1 IHp1 p2 IHp2]; simpl. - reflexivity. - intros v Hv. apply H1. simpl. left. apply Hv. - intros i Hi. apply H2. simpl. left. apply Hi. - specialize (IHp1 H1). specialize (IHp2 H2). destruct op; simpl; rewrite IHp1, IHp2; reflexivity.
